projects.name: Threads
projects.description: Using Next.js, MongoDB, I created a threads app clone that skyrocketed to 100 million sign-ups in less than 5 days, and dethroned giants like Twitter, ChatGPT, and TikTok to become the fastest-growing app ever

projects.name: Car Showcase
projects.description: This is a simple landing website made using Next.js and Tailwind CSS for showing Cars. This is a fully responsive website

projects.name: GraphQL
projects.description: With featured and recent posts, categories, full markdown articles, author information, comments, and much more, this is a fully responsive Blog App. What's best of all is that you or each and every member of an organization can manage the blog from a dedicated Content Management System.

projects.name: Nike
projects.description: This is a fully responsive and simple Nike Landing Page containing the latest design patterns for E-commerce applications

projects.name: Pinterest
projects.description: With all advanced Social Media features, such as Google Authentication, create, edit, delete and save posts, like and comment on other people's posts, search and filter images, and much more, I have created a combination of Pinterest and Instagram and I call it Pinstagram

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A MERN stack Task Manager App in which you can assign tasks to yourself and others using their email IDs registered with the app. You can also check tasks on specific dates and toggle between active, pending, and done tasks
